BLOCK.DESCRIPTION: A következő körig elhárítja a támadásokat.

BURN.DESCRIPTION: Az égések kijátszhatatlan státusz kártyák, melyek megsebeznek téged.

CHANNEL.DESCRIPTION: Egy Gömb sugárzása során, azt az első üres helyre hozza létre. Ha nincs üres helyed, az első helyen álló Gömböd #yMegidéződik, hogy felszabadítson egy helyet.

CONFUSED.DESCRIPTION: Bármikor ha kártyát húzol, a költsége véletlenszerű lesz.

CURSE.DESCRIPTION: Az Átok kártyák negatív hatásúak, s nem tűnnek el a paklidból.

DARK.DESCRIPTION: Gömb: Minden körben növekszik a sebzése. Amikor #yMegidéződik, a legkevesebb HP-val rendelkező ellenfelet támadja.

DAZED.DESCRIPTION: A Kábult kártyák kijátszhatatlan státusz kártyák.

DEXTERITY.DESCRIPTION: Az Ügyesség segítségével több Védelmet szerzel a Kártyákból.

ETHEREAL.DESCRIPTION: Ha ez a kártya a kezedben marad a kör végén, akkor ki lesz merítve. A kimerített kártyák a harc végéig kikerülnek a paklidból.

EVOKE.DESCRIPTION: Consume your rightmost Orb and use its Evoke effect.

FOCUS.DESCRIPTION: Focus increases the effectiveness of #yChanneled Orbs.

FRAIL.DESCRIPTION: While Frail, gain #b25% less #yBlock from cards.

INNATE.DESCRIPTION: Start each combat with this card in your hand.

INTANGIBLE.DESCRIPTION: Reduce ALL damage taken and HP loss to #b1.

LIGHTNING.DESCRIPTION: Orb: Deals damage to random enemies.

LOCKED.DESCRIPTION: This card has yet to be unlocked.

OPENER.DESCRIPTION: Opener cards may only be played as the first card each turn.

POISON.DESCRIPTION: Poisoned creatures lose HP at the start of their turn. Each turn, Poison is reduced by #b1.

RETAIN.DESCRIPTION: Retained cards are not discarded at the end of turn.

SHIV.DESCRIPTION: Shivs are #b0 cost Attack cards which Exhaust.

STATUS.DESCRIPTION: Status cards are removed at the end of combat.

STRENGTH.DESCRIPTION: Strength adds additional damage to attacks.

STRIKE.DESCRIPTION: Any card with the word "Strike" in its name.

TEXT: Energy is used to play cards from your hand.

THORNS.DESCRIPTION: When receiving #yAttack damage, deals damage back.

TODO.DESCRIPTION: This card is NOT IMPLEMENTED. Someone should really fix that...

TRANSFORM.DESCRIPTION: Transformed cards become a random card of any rarity.

UNKNOWN.DESCRIPTION: This card has yet to be encountered.

UNPLAYABLE.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable cards cannot be played from your hand.

UPGRADE.DESCRIPTION: Upgrading cards makes them more powerful. Cards can only be upgraded once.

VOID.DESCRIPTION: Voids are unplayable status cards that consume energy when drawn.

VULNERABLE.DESCRIPTION: Vulnerable creatures take #b50% more damage from Attacks.

WEAK.DESCRIPTION: Weakened creatures deal #b25% less damage with Attacks.
